thread.title: The Chase viewers dub Kelly a 'snake' after she takes outrageous offer
thread.title_full: The Chase viewers dub Kelly a 'snake' after she takes outrageous offer

author: Joshua Barrie
title: The Chase viewers dub Kelly a 'snake' after she takes outrageous offer
text:
The Chase viewers dub Kelly a 'snake' after she takes outrageous offer Some people said they called the police to report Kelly for theft Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The Chase contestant faced backlash for choosing -£6000 Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Viewers have blasted a woman called Kelly after she took a sizeable minus offer on The Chase . 
Early on in Thursday's episode, Kelly was in danger of being caught by the chaser , so took a £6,000 cut to stay safe in the game. 
People lost the plot over her decision, which, as per the game, led her team's collective money pot to decrease by the hefty sum. Scenes (Photo: ITV) 
To top it off, Kelly kept herself in the ITV game show, despite not answering as many question as her teammates Cieran or David. Ceiran was the star, apparently. Kelly also laughed at a team mate's incorrect answer at one stage... She walked away with a share of the winnings after the group managed to score a £12,000 prize pot. Kelly cashed in (Photo: ITV) Read More Twitter kicked off in a big way when Kelly took the minus six offer, and then ended up £4,000 better off at the end Viewers really didn't hold back People said Kelly had "no shame" Kelly got the money though (Photo: ITV) Read More
